mapper.select: SELECT w.* FROM wishlist w JOIN funding f ON w.funding_id = f.funding_id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId} AND f.status = 'ONGOING'
SELECT w.* FROM wishList w JOIN funding f ON w.funding_id = f.funding_id WHERE w.user_id = #{userId} AND f.status IN ('SUCCESS', 'FAIL')
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM wishList WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND funding_id = #{fundingId}
